CustomField.formula: IF(Property__c != null, Property__r.Property_Street__c + ' ' + Property__r.Property_City__c + ', ' + Property__r.Property_State__c + ' '+ Property__r.Property_Zip__c, Borrower_Lead__r.Subject_Property_Street__c + ' ' + Borrower_Lead__r.Subject_Property_City__c + ', ' + Borrower_Lead__r.Subject_Property_State__c + Borrower_Lead__r.Subject_Property_Zip__c)
CustomField.label: Property Address
